Package com.xebisco.yield.physics

Klasse CircleCollider

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
com.xebisco.yield.physics.Collider
com.xebisco.yield.physics.CircleCollider
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable, Renderable
public class CircleCollider extends Collider
The CircleCollider class defines a circle collider with a radius and center point that can be set and retrieved.

  • Feldübersicht

    • getShape

      public org.jbox2d.collision.shapes.Shape getShape()
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: Collider
      This function returns a Shape object and is declared as abstract. This shape will be used in PhysicsBodies when creating its bodies fixtures in Box2D.
      Angegeben von:
      getShape in Klasse Collider
      Gibt zurück:
      An abstract Shape object is being returned.

      public double getRadius()
      The function returns the value of the radius.
      Gibt zurück:

    • setRadius

      public void setRadius(double radius)
      The function sets the value of the radius variable.
      Parameter:
      radius - The parameter "radius" is a double data type that represents the radius of a circle. The method "setRadius" sets the value of the instance variable "radius" to the value passed as a parameter.

      public Vector2D getCenter()
